sections.name: Cataclysm Beetle
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 40

traits.name: Rare
traits.text: This rarity indicates that a rules element is very difficult to find in the game world. A rare feat, spell, item or the like is available to players only if the GM decides to include it in the game, typically through discovery during play. Creatures with this trait are rare. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creatures is increased by 5.

traits.name: Beast
traits.text: A creature similar to an animal but with an Intelligence modifier of –3 or higher is usually a beast. Unlike an animal, a beast might be able to speak and reason.

link.name: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 40
link.alt: Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients pg. 40

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Acid
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal acid damage. Creatures with this trait have a magical connection to acid.

traits.name: Brutal
traits.text: A ranged attack with this trait uses its Strength modifier instead of Dexterity on the attack roll.

traits.name: Range
traits.text: These attacks will either list a finite range or a range increment, which follows the normal rules for range increments.

ability.name: Bombardier's Spray

traits.name: Acid
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal acid damage. Creatures with this trait have a magical connection to acid.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

ability.text: The cataclysm beetle sprays a 60-foot cone of acid from its abdomen that deals 12d10 acid damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds.

ability.name: Burning Pool

traits.name: Acid
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal acid damage. Creatures with this trait have a magical connection to acid.

traits.name: Primal
traits.text: This magic comes from the primal tradition, connecting to the natural world and instinct. Anything with this trait is magical.

ability.text: The cataclysm beetle spills acid directly from its abdomen, creating a wave of acid that deals 10d12 acid damage to all creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 40 basic Fortitude save). Creatures that fail this save are pushed back 10 feet from the cataclysm beetle (30 feet on a critical failure). It can't use Bombardier's Spray or Burning Pool for 1d4 rounds.
